Class PatrollingEnemy

java.lang.Object
GameObject
Entity
Enemy
PatrollingEnemy
Direct Known Subclasses:
Butterfly, Firefly
public class PatrollingEnemy extends Enemy

Super for Butterfly and Firefly, uses Movement priority to find the next path to move to.

Version:
1.0.1 Last Changed: 6/12/24
Author:
Joseph Parish.

    • calculateNextMove

      public void calculateNextMove(Map map)
      Finds if a move direction is available to move to, if not then it trys the next.
      Parameters:
      map - the current level map.

    • move

      public void move(Map map, Direction dir)
      Moves the butterfly in the specified direction by updating its position on the map. This method is called by calculateNextMove.
      Specified by:
      move in class Entity
      Parameters:
      map - the current level map.
      dir - the direction in which the butterfly is moving.
